incidents.name: Connectivity Lost on 10% of Super SIM Devices

incident_updates.body: We will close the post on Twilio's Status Page. If you have been impacted by this incident and wish to continue to receive updates, please open a ticket with customer support.

We have observed that the recent impact was limited to devices connected over AT&T. Currently, we are monitoring the situation as approximately 3% of devices may still experience connectivity issues. These devices might encounter a poor data connection or have short-lived sessions.
Our engineering team is actively working alongside the affected network provider to resolve the issue as quickly as possible. In the meantime, we kindly suggest that customers reset the connectivity through the console if they notice that some of their SIM cards are still experiencing issues. This can often help re-establish a stable connection for the affected devices. We expect to provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We are still experiencing Super SIM data sessions issues. Devices that attempted to reconnect immediately after losing connectivity should have been able to successfully reconnect to the redundant instances while the impacted one recovered. We will continue to monitor and will provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.

We are observing improvement in Connectivity Lost on devices active data sessions on Super SIM. Devices that attempted to reconnect immediately after losing connectivity should have been able to successfully reconnect to the redundant instances while the impacted one recovered. We will continue to monitor to ensure full service recovery. We expect to provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

Devices that attempted to reconnect immediately after losing connectivity should have been able to successfully reconnect to the redundant instances while the impacted one recovered. We will continue to monitor and will provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

Beginning at 02:16 UTC, we observed around 10% of active data sessions on Super SIM being dropped. we are investigating an issue where devices using Super SIM may experience the issue. We will provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.

incidents.name: Automated Alert: Minimal Customer Impact

incident_updates.body: We have fully investigated the Verify issue, and it was determined that the impact was limited to a small set of customers, who have been contacted individually to address any concerns. All systems are operational.
Our monitoring systems have detected a potential issue with Verify. Our engineering team has been alerted and is actively investigating. We will update as soon as we have more information.

components.name: Verify
components.description: May be impacted by SMS delivery issues

incidents.name: Flex, Programmable Voice Client JS, and SIP Registration Failures

incident_updates.body: All services impacted by an issue causing failures in Flex, SIP Registration, and Programmable Voice Javascript SDK call connectivity have recovered and are operating as intended. This incident has been resolved.

We continue to observe recovery from the issue causing failures in Flex, SIP Registration, and Programmable Voice Javascript SDK call connectivity. We will continue to monitor to ensure full recovery.  We expect to provide another update in 30 minutes.

We are observing recovery from the issue causing failures in Flex, SIP Registration, and Programmable Voice Javascript SDK call connectivity. We will continue to monitor to ensure full recovery.  We expect to provide another update in 30 minutes.

We are experiencing failures for Flex, SIP registration, and Programmable Voice Javascript SDK call connectivity. Our engineers are investigating. We expect to provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.

Our monitoring systems have detected a potential issue with Voice JS SDK call connectivity in all regions. Our engineering team has been alerted and is actively investigating. We will update as soon as we have more information.

incidents.name: Automated Alert

incident_updates.body: We are still experiencing issues with the Flex UI, however, since there are several Twilio impacted services, we’re resolving this post and we’re consolidating all impacted products and services into one post. You can check the status of this at https://status.twilio.com/incidents/q8ykjgl8lfhn
Our monitoring systems have detected a potential issue with Flex UI. Our engineering team has been alerted and is actively investigating. We will update as soon as we have more information.

incidents.name: Automated Alert

incident_updates.body: We are still experiencing issues with the Console logins, however, since there are several Twilio impacted services, we’re resolving this banner and we’re consolidating all impacted products and services into one post. You can check the status of this at https://status.twilio.com/incidents/q8ykjgl8lfhn
Our monitoring systems have detected a potential issue with Console logins. Our engineering team has been alerted and is actively investigating. We will update as soon as we have more information.

incidents.name: SMS Delivery Delays to Congo Orange/Tigo Network

incident_updates.body: We are no longer experiencing SMS delivery delays when sending messages to the Congo Orange/Tigo network. This incident has been resolved.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS, Middle East & Africa

incident_updates.body: We are observing recovery in SMS delivery delays when sending messages to the Congo Orange/Tigo network. We will continue monitoring the service to ensure a full recovery. We will provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS, Middle East & Africa

incident_updates.body: We continue experiencing SMS delivery delays when sending messages to  Congo Orange/Tigo network. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 4 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.
